title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; stream chats or pull models from npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); chat, manage models, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; stream or block on chat, pull models, list running models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, embed and manage local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, RAG, fine-tuning and edge deployment.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for Ollama; declarative model management and systemd service.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and persistent storage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat over your docs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams answers from local Ollama models; slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; mention the bot or DM it to chat with any local model.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama in CI pipelines; pull models and run tests against local LLMs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings and model management via NuGet.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Chroma, qdrant and RAG tools for quick start.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: Experimental Ollama backend to run GPT4All models natively with the same REST API.
